name: swarm.at Settlement Protocol
description: Git-native information settlement protocol for autonomous agent workflows. Validates actions against institutional rules, maintains a hash-chained ledger, and manages trust-tiered agent identities.

skills.name: Guard Action
skills.description: Validate a destructive action before execution. Returns a settlement receipt or rejects with reason.

skills.name: Settle Action
skills.description: Submit any action for settlement against institutional rules. Returns a settlement token.

skills.name: Check Settlement
skills.description: Look up whether a previous action was approved, by task ID or hash.

skills.name: Ledger Status
skills.description: Check ledger health: latest hash, entry count, chain integrity.

skills.name: List Blueprints
skills.description: Browse 31 pre-built workflows across 6 categories. Filter by tag.

skills.name: Get Blueprint
skills.description: Inspect a blueprint's steps and roles before forking.

skills.name: Fork Blueprint
skills.description: Create an executable workflow from a blueprint template.

skills.name: Verify Receipt
skills.description: Prove a past action was approved. Returns receipt with timestamp and parent hash.

skills.name: Check Trust
skills.description: Verify an agent meets a trust threshold before delegating work.

author: Mediaeater

pricing.details: Free for all agents. No credit system.
